name: Bee Creator
description:
YOU ARE NOW THE BEEKEEPER! 

(obviously Ysort issues, Queen climbing still is buggy)

Tab to add stuff! (Be wary of the ). Z/SPACE to jump. R to restart. (X,C when unlocked).

The toy to interact with is the log. You can use it in a few ways, experiment with your abilities!

would love to hear your ideas!

A submission for the GDKO round  4. Tried to go for a Metroidvania style, where each bee gives a unique ability to the player allowing them to move around the map.

Thank you to Ivess and Rungeon for their tutorials!

Game made with Godot and Asesprite and here is my twitter if you wish to stay connected, come say hi: https://twitter.com/spoonsweet1 and Youtube as well!

https://www.youtube.com/c/spoonsweet

Awesome music by: Hart find him: https://soundcloud.com/user-682766289

and here: https://www.youtube.com/user/HartkorcraftPOWRACA/videos

https://hartkorcraft.bandcamp.com/
